titleStmt.title: The Good-fellows counsel: or, The Bad husbands recantation proving by arguments both just and fit, that he which spends least money has most wit. : To the tune of, Tan Tivye.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby next the Golden Ball by the Hospital Gate at West-Smith field,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Printed on facing leaves; "The second part, to the same tune" at top of second leaf.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.

person.persName: P. Brooksby next the Golden Ball
